name: gmc-bin-prebuilts
description: makes available go-musicoin binaries in node projects

scripts.preinstall: yarn clone && yarn build && mv go-musicoin/build/bin .
scripts.build: yarn build.darwin/386 && yarn build.darwin/amd64 && yarn build.windows/386 && yarn build.windows/amd64 && yarn build.linux/386 && yarn build.linux/amd64
scripts.build.darwin/386: cd go-musicoin && build/env.sh go run build/ci.go xgo -- --go=latest --targets=darwin/386 -v ./cmd/gmc
scripts.build.darwin/amd64: cd go-musicoin && build/env.sh go run build/ci.go xgo -- --go=latest --targets=darwin/amd64 -v ./cmd/gmc
scripts.build.windows/386: cd go-musicoin && build/env.sh go run build/ci.go xgo -- --go=latest --targets=windows/386 -v ./cmd/gmc
scripts.build.windows/amd64: cd go-musicoin && build/env.sh go run build/ci.go xgo -- --go=latest --targets=windows/amd64 -v ./cmd/gmc
scripts.build.linux/386: cd go-musicoin && build/env.sh go run build/ci.go xgo -- --go=latest --targets=linux/386 -v ./cmd/gmc
scripts.build.linux/amd64: cd go-musicoin && build/env.sh go run build/ci.go xgo -- --go=latest --targets=linux/amd64 -v ./cmd/gmc
